languages.text: "Когда один из таких ублюдков вырвался на свободу, команда приняла решение просто разгерметизировать отсек и избавиться и от него, и от пленников и экипажа, затронутых его скверной. Но и после этого я слышал эхо бесчеловечных страданий и ужаса, что наполняли ту часть корабля. Даже сегодня воспоминание об этом эпизоде будит во мне скорбь".

"Once, when one of the miscreants broke free, those in command simply depressurised the bay and got rid of the culprit, along with the prisoners and crew tainted by him. But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."
languages.original_text: "Когда один из таких ублюдков вырвался на свободу, команда приняла решение просто разгерметизировать отсек и избавиться и от него, и от пленников и экипажа, затронутых его скверной. Но и после этого я слышал эхо бесчеловечных страданий и ужаса, что наполняли ту часть корабля. Даже сегодня воспоминание об этом эпизоде будит во мне скорбь".

But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “有一次，有个异端分子冲破了束缚。船上的指挥人员仅仅是给那片船舱减压，把那个家伙丢出了气闸，那些遭到他腐化的囚犯与船员也被一起丢了出去。但在那之后，我依然听到了那群人痛苦与恐怖的声音在船上回荡。即便是现在，每当我回忆起那段往事时，都会感到悲痛难耐。”
languages.original_text: "Once, when one of the miscreants broke free, those in command simply depressurised the bay and got rid of the culprit, along with the prisoners and crew tainted by him. But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."

traits.locale_text: “有一次，有个异端分子冲破了束缚。船上的指挥人员仅仅是给那片船舱减压，把那个家伙丢出了气闸，那些遭到他腐化的囚犯与船员也被一起丢了出去。但在那之后，我依然听到了那群人痛苦与恐怖的声音在船上回荡。即便是现在，每当我回忆起那段往事时，都会感到悲痛难耐。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Once, when one of the miscreants broke free, those in command simply depressurised the bay and got rid of the culprit, along with the prisoners and crew tainted by him. But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."

languages.text: «Una vez, cuando uno de los canallas se liberó, los que estaban al mando no dudaron en despresurizar la bahía y eliminar al culpable junto con los demás prisioneros y tripulantes que había mancillado. Pero, incluso después de eso, oía los ecos del sufrimiento y terror inhumanos que llenaban esa parte de la nave. Aún a día de hoy me apena recordar ese momento».
languages.original_text: "Once, when one of the miscreants broke free, those in command simply depressurised the bay and got rid of the culprit, along with the prisoners and crew tainted by him. But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."

traits.locale_text: «Una vez, cuando uno de los canallas se liberó, los que estaban al mando no dudaron en despresurizar la bahía y eliminar al culpable junto con los demás prisioneros y tripulantes que había mancillado. Pero, incluso después de eso, oía los ecos del sufrimiento y terror inhumanos que llenaban esa parte de la nave. Aún a día de hoy me apena recordar ese momento».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「かつて、悪しきものの一人が脱走したとき、指揮官たちは単に湾内を減圧して、彼に汚染された囚人や乗組員とともに犯人を追い払った。しかし、それ以後も、船内には非人間的な苦痛と恐怖が響いていた。今日に至るまで、そのエピソードを思い出すと悲しみの念が湧いてくる」
languages.original_text: "Once, when one of the miscreants broke free, those in command simply depressurised the bay and got rid of the culprit, along with the prisoners and crew tainted by him. But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて、悪しきものの一人が脱走したとき、指揮官たちは単に湾内を減圧して、彼に汚染された囚人や乗組員とともに犯人を追い払った。しかし、それ以後も、船内には非人間的な苦痛と恐怖が響いていた。今日に至るまで、そのエピソードを思い出すと悲しみの念が湧いてくる」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Einmal brach eine der Kreaturen aus, und die Befehlshaber schalteten einfach den Druckabgleich für das Schiffssegment ab, um die Kreatur sowie die von ihr verdorbenen Gefangenen und Crewmitglieder auszulöschen. Doch selbst danach hörte ich noch das Echo unmenschlicher Pein und Furcht, die diesen Teil des Schiffs erfüllten. Bis heute bestürzt es mich, an diesen Tag zu denken."
languages.original_text: "Once, when one of the miscreants broke free, those in command simply depressurised the bay and got rid of the culprit, along with the prisoners and crew tainted by him. But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."

traits.locale_text: "Einmal brach eine der Kreaturen aus, und die Befehlshaber schalteten einfach den Druckabgleich für das Schiffssegment ab, um die Kreatur sowie die von ihr verdorbenen Gefangenen und Crewmitglieder auszulöschen. Doch selbst danach hörte ich noch das Echo unmenschlicher Pein und Furcht, die diesen Teil des Schiffs erfüllten. Bis heute bestürzt es mich, an diesen Tag zu denken."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Pendant le voyage, l'un de ces scélérats est parvenu à s'échapper. Pour se débarrasser de lui et de tous ceux qu'il avait corrompus, prisonniers comme membres de l'équipage, les officiers se sont contentés de dépressuriser la baie. Mais même après ça, je pouvais encore entendre les échos non-humains de la souffrance et de la terreur dans cette partie du vaisseau. Aujourd'hui encore, me souvenir de cet épisode me plonge dans une profonde tristesse. »
languages.original_text: "Once, when one of the miscreants broke free, those in command simply depressurised the bay and got rid of the culprit, along with the prisoners and crew tainted by him. But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."

traits.locale_text: « Pendant le voyage, l'un de ces scélérats est parvenu à s'échapper. Pour se débarrasser de lui et de tous ceux qu'il avait corrompus, prisonniers comme membres de l'équipage, les officiers se sont contentés de dépressuriser la baie. Mais même après ça, je pouvais encore entendre les échos inhumains de la souffrance et de la terreur dans cette partie du vaisseau. Aujourd'hui encore, me souvenir de cet épisode me plonge dans une profonde tristesse. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bir keresinde o zalimlerden biri serbest kalmıştı. Baştakilerin çözümü, bölmenin basıncını düşürüp mahkûm, tayfa, etkilenmiş kim varsa yok etmek oldu. Gerçi ona rağmen geminin o kısmından gelen dehşet, azap dolu çığlıkları hatırlıyorum. Bugün dahi düşündükçe içim acıyor."
languages.original_text: "Once, when one of the miscreants broke free, those in command simply depressurised the bay and got rid of the culprit, along with the prisoners and crew tainted by him. But even after that, I heard the echo of inhuman suffering and terror that filled that part of the ship. It grieves me to recall that episode to this day."

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde o zalimlerden biri serbest kaldı. Baştakilerin çözümü, bölmenin basıncını düşürüp mahkûm, tayfa, etkilenmiş kim varsa yok etmek oldu. Gerçi ona rağmen geminin o kısmından gelen dehşet, azap dolu çığlıkları hatırlıyorum. Bugün dahi düşündükçe içim acıyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
